title: Design Tailings Delivery Pipeline
description: An engineer designs the pipeline system to transport tailings from the processing plant to the tailings storage facility (TSF).

tasks.description: Determine the required throughput of the pipeline based on the plant's production rate and the slurry's density.
tasks.expected_outcome: The required flow rate for the pipeline is calculated.

tasks.description: Perform a hydraulic analysis to determine the optimal pipe diameter and the pressure required from the pumps.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pipe size and pump specifications are determined.

tasks.description: Design the pipeline route from the plant to the TSF, minimizing length and elevation changes where possible.
tasks.expected_outcome: A final pipeline design and layout is created.
